# Third Party Notices

This project vendors the following third-party libraries under `extension/vendor/`:

- `marked` v17.0.1 (MIT License) — `extension/vendor/marked.umd.js`
- `DOMPurify` v3.3.1 (Apache-2.0 OR MPL-2.0) — `extension/vendor/purify.min.js`
- `mermaid` v10.x (MIT License) — `extension/vendor/mermaid.min.js`

Upstream sources and licenses:

- Marked: https://github.com/markedjs/marked (see `LICENSE.md`)
- DOMPurify: https://github.com/cure53/DOMPurify (see `LICENSE`)
- Mermaid: https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid (see `LICENSE`)
